casebody.data:
REPUBLICAN ATTORNEYS GENERAL ASSOCIATION, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Kerry Louise Earley, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department, Real Party in Interest. No. 77219 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED OCTOBER 29, 2018

DENIED.
